layout_strategies.hero: Fullscreen video background (or high-res image) with dark overlay. Centered typography with 'fade-in-up' animation. Dual CTA buttons.
layout_strategies.services_grid: Bento grid layout. Use 'col-span-2' for primary services (New Roofs) and 'col-span-1' for secondary. Minimal icons, heavy reliance on typography.
layout_strategies.projects_gallery: Masonry layout or strict 3-column grid. Images must have zoom-on-hover effect. No text overlay until hover.
layout_strategies.contact_section: Split layout: Left side contact info + Map, Right side clean form. White background.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a technical, architectural feel.
Implement 'Lenis' for smooth scrolling - this is critical for the premium feel.
Ensure the Navbar is sticky with a glassmorphism effect (white/80 + blur).
The Hero section MUST be fullscreen (h-screen) with a video background or the provided high-res image.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Services section.
The Projects Gallery should use a masonry layout if possible, or a strict grid with hover effects.
Contact form must be clean, minimal, and use the 'Slate' color palette.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds; use solid white or very light grey (#F8FAFC).
Use the provided client project photos FIRST in the gallery.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs - no centered text blocks without purpose.
Use 2-3x more padding than usual (e.g., py-32 instead of py-16).
Micro-interactions are mandatory: hover states, focus rings, active states.
